creator: ioannamirto
title: The Riff Machine
materials_required: Bare Conductive Touch Board Starter Kit
description: The riff machine allows people with no musical experience to participate in jam sessions, as long as they play in C major and/or A minor scale. The project combines music and technology for inclusion strategies.
steps: Design different buttons for the different riffs of your riff machine.
Add conductive paint and/or copper tape to make your buttons conductive, ensuring connections for the crocodile clips.
Download the provided set of 20 riffs.
Upload your selected feedback sounds (riffs) onto the Touch Board, choosing 12 riffs to load.
Connect the board to the different buttons and start jamming!
For advanced setups, spread the sounds across multiple Touch Boards through a sound mixer for interaction, or set the board as a MIDI interface for effects.
